docs.text:
Welcome to C++


Here you will learn the basics of c++.


FAQs






Where do I run the code?




You can either 
install python
  (Windows, Mac, and Linux) or 
code online
 (All Platforms ) 








What if I need help?
 




We're only 
an email
 away :D






What if I'm not a part of SD Code?
 


Don't worry about it! This resource is free to use by anyone!






Can I host this on my website?


Sure, as long as you give credit and link it to our website






How can I contribute?


Submit a pull request to the repository on 
Github








Creators


Lead Curriculum Designer
: Sarthak Madhan


Website Manager
: Ronak Shah
